title: Top Places to visit in Mathura, Uttar Pradesh
content: Mathura is a city in the North Indian state of Uttar Pradesh.It is located approximately 50 kilometres (31 mi) north of Agra, and 145 kilometres (90 mi) south-east of Delhi; about 11 kilometres (6.8 mi) from the town of Vrindavan, and 22 kilometres (14 mi) from Govardhan. It is the administrative
